page.title: 07SCHOOLS IN BO'NESS
page.content: In this block we have three schools; two primary and one secondary. We have a catholic primary (St.Mary's) and a non catholic primary school (Grange). We also have a secondary school (Bo'ness Academy). All the pupils from the other schools go to it apart from the catholic school, they go to Falkirk. Bo'ness Academy has more than 1000 pupils. It is very big and has large playing fields. The non catholic school has about 200 and the catholic about 100 children in them. All of the schools are in nice grounds. The secondary school teaches from first year to sixth year. The primary schools teach from primary 1 to primary 7. All the schools are quite near each other. All of the schools are near houses so most people do not have to walk far.
